author: dkdkdkdkdkdk
content: do you know why BLS withdrawal credentials were introduced in the first place, then? it seems ETH1 is the "obvious" approach

author: lsankar
content: At the time that bls withdrawal creds were made the default, the current plan for merging eth1/eth2 hadn’t emerged as the path forward yet. So wasn’t as obvious that eth1 creds were the way to do it

author: jgm
content: The more I consider it the more that it makes sense with the current direction of the merge.  I don't see any value in a BLS withdrawal key unless it has some additional privileges around future operations.
